| <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-1515">Дополнение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-1515">Addition</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-1516">1.0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-1516">v1.0</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-1517">Добавлен тип ресурса [tokenIssuancePolicy](/graph/api/resources/tokenissuancepolicy?view=graph-rest-1.0), который управляет характеристиками маркеров SAML, выпущенных Azure AD.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-1517">Added the [tokenIssuancePolicy](/graph/api/resources/tokenissuancepolicy?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource type, which controls the characteristics of SAML tokens issued by Azure AD.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-1518">Это позволяет вам установить алгоритм подписи, параметры подписи или версию маркера SAML, которая будет использоваться для выдачи токена SAML.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-1518">This allows you to set the signing algorithm, signing options, or SAML token version to be used to issue the SAML token.</span></span>|

data-stu-id="a50bf-2116">beta</span></span> |<span data-ttu-id="a50bf-2117">Обновлена коллекция существующих политик с использованием сегмента URL-адреса как описано в [этой записи блога](https://developer.microsoft.com/identity/blogs/breaking-changes-policy-api-microsoft-graph-beta/).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-2118">Typed policy resources are now grouped under the policies segment as described in [this blog post](https://developer.microsoft.com/identity/blogs/breaking-changes-policy-api-microsoft-graph-beta/).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-2119">Это обновление добавляет четыре ресурса типизированных политик:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-2119">This update adds four typed policy resources:</span></span> <br> <li>[<span data-ttu-id="a50bf-2120">activityBasedTimeoutPolicies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-2123">tokenLifetimePolicies</span></span>](/graph/api/resources/tokenlifetimepolicy?view=graph-rest-beta)</li> |
| <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-2124">Дополнение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-2124">Addition</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-2125">Бета</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-2125">beta</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-2126">Добавленный тип ресурса [activityBasedTimeoutPolicy](/graph/api/resources/activityBasedTimeoutPolicy?view=graph-rest-beta) управляет автоматическим выходом для веб-сессий после периода бездействия для приложений, поддерживающих функции времени ожидания на основе действий.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-2126">Added [activityBasedTimeoutPolicy](/graph/api/resources/activityBasedTimeoutPolicy?view=graph-rest-beta) resource type controls automatic sign-out for web sessions after a period of inactivity, for applications that support activity-based timeout functionality.</span></span>|
| <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-2127">Дополнение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-2127">Addition</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-2128">Бета</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-2128">beta</span></span> |<span data-ttu-id="a50bf-2129">Добавлен тип ресурса [claimsMappingPolicy](/graph/api/resources/claimsMappingPolicy?view=graph-rest-beta), который управляет сопоставлением заявок для протоколов WS-Fed, SAML, OAuth 2.0 и OpenID Connect, для маркеров, выпущенных для конкретного приложения.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-2129">Added the [claimsMappingPolicy](/graph/api/resources/claimsMappingPolicy?view=graph-rest-beta) resource type, which controls the claims mapping for WS-Fed, SAML, OAuth 2.0, and OpenID Connect protocols, for tokens issued to a specific application.</span></span>|
| <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-2130">Дополнение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-2130">Addition</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-2131">бета</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-2131">beta</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-2132">Добавлен тип ресурса [homeRealmDiscoveryPolicy](/graph/api/resources/homeRealmDiscoveryPolicy?view=graph-rest-beta), который управляет поведением аутентификации Azure Active Directory для федеративных пользователей, в частности для ограничений автоускорения и аутентификации пользователей в федеративных доменах.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-2132">Added the [homeRealmDiscoveryPolicy](/graph/api/resources/homeRealmDiscoveryPolicy?view=graph-rest-beta) resource type, which controls Azure Active Directory authentication behavior for federated users, in particular for auto-acceleration and user authentication restrictions in federated domains.</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-2133">Дополнение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-2133">Addition</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-2134">Бета</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-2134">beta</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-2135">Добавлен тип ресурса [tokenLifetimePolicy](/graph/api/resources/tokenlifetimepolicy?view=graph-rest-beta), который управляет временем жизни маркеров доступа, используемых для доступа к защищенным ресурсам.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-2135">Added the [tokenLifetimePolicy](/graph/api/resources/tokenlifetimepolicy?view=graph-rest-beta) resource type, which controls the lifetime duration of access tokens used to access protected resources.</span></span>|
| <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-2136">Дополнение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-2136">Addition</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-2137">бета</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-2137">beta</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-2138">Добавлен тип ресурса [tokenIssuancePolicy](/graph/api/resources/tokenissuancepolicy?view=graph-rest-beta), который управляет характеристиками маркеров SAML, выпущенных Azure AD.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-2138">Added the [tokenIssuancePolicy](/graph/api/resources/tokenissuancepolicy?view=graph-rest-beta) resource type, which controls the characteristics of SAML tokens issued by Azure AD.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-2139">Это позволяет вам установить алгоритм подписи, параметры подписи или версию маркера SAML, которая будет использоваться для выдачи токена SAML.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-2139">This allows you to set the signing algorithm, signing options, or SAML token version to be used to issue the SAML token.</span></span>

|<span data-ttu-id="a50bf-2269">Изменение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-2269">Change</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-2270">Бета</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-2270">beta</span></span> |<span data-ttu-id="a50bf-2271">Обновлена коллекция существующих политик с использованием сегмента URL-адреса как описано в [этой записи блога](https://developer.microsoft.com/identity/blogs/breaking-changes-policy-api-microsoft-graph-beta/).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-2272">Typed | <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-2278">Дополнение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-2278">Addition</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-2279">Бета</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-2279">beta</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-2280">Добавленный тип ресурса [activityBasedTimeoutPolicy](/graph/api/resources/activityBasedTimeoutPolicy?view=graph-rest-beta) управляет автоматическим выходом для веб-сессий после периода бездействия для приложений, поддерживающих функции времени ожидания на основе действий.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-2280">Added [activityBasedTimeoutPolicy](/graph/api/resources/activityBasedTimeoutPolicy?view=graph-rest-beta) resource type controls automatic sign-out for web sessions after a period of inactivity, for applications that support activity-based timeout functionality.</span></span>|
| <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-2281">Дополнение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-2281">Addition</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-2282">Бета</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-2282">beta</span></span> |<span data-ttu-id="a50bf-2283">Тип ресурса [claimsMappingPolicy](/graph/api/resources/claimsMappingPolicy?view=graph-rest-beta) управляет сопоставлением утверждений для протоколов WS-Fed, SAML, OAuth 2.0 и OpenID Connect при использовании маркеров, выпущенных для конкретного приложения.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-2283">[claimsMappingPolicy](/graph/api/resources/claimsMappingPolicy?view=graph-rest-beta) resource type controls the claims mapping for WS-Fed, SAML, OAuth 2.0, and OpenID Connect protocols, for tokens issued to a specific application.</span></span>|
| <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-2284">Дополнение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-2284">Addition</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-2285">бета</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-2285">beta</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-2286">Тип ресурса [homeRealmDiscoveryPolicy](/graph/api/resources/homeRealmDiscoveryPolicy?view=graph-rest-beta) управляет действием проверки подлинности Azure Active Directory для федеративных пользователей, в частности, для автоматического ускорения и ограничений проверки подлинности в федеративных доменах.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-2286">[homeRealmDiscoveryPolicy](/graph/api/resources/homeRealmDiscoveryPolicy?view=graph-rest-beta) resource type controls Azure Active Directory authentication behavior for federated users, in particular for auto-acceleration and user authentication restrictions in federated domains.</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-2287">Дополнение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-2287">Addition</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-2288">Бета</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-2288">beta</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-2289">Тип ресурса [tokenLifetimePolicy](/graph/api/resources/tokenlifetimepolicy?view=graph-rest-beta) управляет длительностью жизненного цикла маркеров доступа, используемых для доступа к защищенным ресурсам.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-2289">[tokenLifetimePolicy](/graph/api/resources/tokenlifetimepolicy?view=graph-rest-beta) resource type controls the lifetime duration of access tokens used to access protected resources.</span></span>|
|<span data-ttu-id="a50bf-2290">Дополнение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-2290">Addition</span></span>| <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-2291">Бета</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-2291">beta</span></span>| <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-2292">Добавлено свойство servicePrincipal в [перечисление provisioningObjectSummary](/graph/api/resources/provisioning-object-summary-list?view=graph-rest-beta).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-2292">Added the servicePrincipal property to [List provisioningObjectSummary](/graph/api/resources/provisioning-object-summary-list?view=graph-rest-beta).</span></span>|

| <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-3944">**Тип изменения**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-3944">**Change type**</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-3945">**Версия**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-3945">**Version**</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-3946">**Описание**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-3946">**Description**</span></span>                          |

| <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-3947">Дополнение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-3947">Addition</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-3948">Бета-версия</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-3948">Beta</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-3949">Представлен новый [API аналитики](/graph/api/resources/useranalytics?view=graph-rest-beta) для рабочих сведений, позволяющий получить аналитику о том, как пользователи тратят свое время на различные действия во время и вне работы, включая звонки, чаты (мгновенные сообщения) письма, сосредоточенную работу и собрания.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-3949">Introduced the new workplace intelligence [analytics API](/graph/api/resources/useranalytics?view=graph-rest-beta) that enables you to get analytics about how users spend their time on various activities during and outside of working hours, including calls, chats (instant messages), emails, focus work, and meetings.</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-3950">Дополнение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-3950">Addition</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-3951">Бета-версия</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-3951">Beta</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-3952">Представлен новый [API параметров](/graph/api/resources/settings?view=graph-rest-beta) для рабочих сведений, представляющий текущие обязательные параметры для применения пользователем [API аналитики](/graph/api/resources/useranalytics?view=graph-rest-beta).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-3952">Introduced the new workplace intelligence [settings API](/graph/api/resources/settings?view=graph-rest-beta) that represents the current required settings for a user to use the [analytics API](/graph/api/resources/useranalytics?view=graph-rest-beta).</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-3953">Дополнение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-3953">Addition</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-3954">Бета-версия</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-3954">Beta</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-3955">Представлен новый тип ресурса [activityStatistics](/graph/api/resources/activitystatistics?view=graph-rest-beta) и следующие новые типы ресурсов, полученные из него: [callActivityStatistics](/graph/api/resources/callactivitystatistics?view=graph-rest-beta), [chatActivityStatistics](/graph/api/resources/chatactivitystatistics?view=graph-rest-beta),[emailActivityStatistics](/graph/api/resources/emailactivitystatistics?view=graph-rest-beta), [focusActivityStatistics](/graph/api/resources/focusactivitystatistics?view=graph-rest-beta) и [meetingActivityStatistics](/graph/api/resources/meetingactivitystatistics?view=graph-rest-beta).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-3955">Introduced the new [activityStatistics](/graph/api/resources/activitystatistics?view=graph-rest-beta) resource type and the following new resource types that are derived from it: [callActivityStatistics](/graph/api/resources/callactivitystatistics?view=graph-rest-beta), [chatActivityStatistics](/graph/api/resources/chatactivitystatistics?view=graph-rest-beta),[emailActivityStatistics](/graph/api/resources/emailactivitystatistics?view=graph-rest-beta), [focusActivityStatistics](/graph/api/resources/focusactivitystatistics?view=graph-rest-beta), and [meetingActivityStatistics](/graph/api/resources/meetingactivitystatistics?view=graph-rest-beta).</span></span> |

### <a name="calendar-mail-personal-contacts"></a><span data-ttu-id="a50bf-4407">Календарь, почта, личные контакты</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-4407">Calendar, mail, personal contacts</span></span>

| <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-4408">**Тип изменения**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-4408">**Change type**</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-4409">**Версия**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-4409">**Version**</span></span>   | <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-4410">**Описание**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-4410">**Description**</span></span>                          |

| <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-4885">Дополнение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-4885">Addition</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-4886">1.0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-4886">v1.0</span></span> |  <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-4887">Представлены новые **API журналов аудита для Azure AD**, предоставляющие журналы действий для задач управления каталогом с помощью объекта [directoryAudit](/graph/api/resources/directoryAudit?view=graph-rest-1.0) и действий входа с помощью объекта [signIns](/graph/api/resources/signIns?view=graph-rest-1.0).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-4887">Introduced the new **audit logs APIs for Azure AD** providing activity logs for directory management tasks through [directoryAudit](/graph/api/resources/directoryAudit?view=graph-rest-1.0) and sign-in activity through [signIns](/graph/api/resources/signIns?view=graph-rest-1.0).</span></span>|
| <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-4888">Дополнение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-4888">Addition</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-4889">бета</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-4889">beta</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-4890">Добавлены новые разрешения приложений для API **проверки доступа**: AccessReview.Read.All, ProgramControl.Read.All и ProgramControl.ReadWrite.All.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-4890">Added new application permissions for **access reviews** APIs: AccessReview.Read.All, ProgramControl.Read.All and ProgramControl.ReadWrite.All.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-4891">Дополнительные сведения см. в статье [Справочник по API проверки доступа](/graph/api/resources/accessreviews-root?view=graph-rest-beta).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-4891">For details, see the [access reviews API reference](/graph/api/resources/accessreviews-root?view=graph-rest-beta).</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-4892">Дополнение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-4892">Addition</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-4893">Бета</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-4893">beta</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-4894">Добавлено свойство **signInSessionsValidFromDateTime** для ресурса [user](/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-beta).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-4894">Add the **signInSessionsValidFromDateTime** property on the [user](/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-4895">Это переименование свойств **refreshTokensValidFromDateTime**, но оба они будут поддерживаться, чтобы обеспечить простую миграцию для клиентов.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-4895">This is a rename of the **refreshTokensValidFromDateTime** properties, but both properties will be supported to allow clients to migrate smoothly.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-4896">В течение следующих нескольких месяцев старое свойство **refreshTokensValidFromDateTime** будет удалено.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-4896">In the next couple months the old property, **refreshTokensValidFromDateTime** will be removed.</span></span>|
| <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-4897">Дополнение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-4897">Addition</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-4898">Бета</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-4898">beta</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-4899">Добавлено действие **revokeSignInSessions** для ресурса [user](/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-beta).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-4899">Add the **revokeSignInSessions** action on the [user](/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-4900">Это переименование действия **invalidateAllRefreshTokens**, но оба служебных действия будут поддерживаться, чтобы обеспечить простую миграцию для клиентов.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-4900">This is a rename of the **invalidateAllRefreshTokens** action, but both service actions will be supported to allow clients to migrate smoothly.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-4901">В течение следующих нескольких месяцев старое служебное действие **invalidateAllRefreshTokens** будет удалено.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-4901">In the next couple months the old service action, **invalidateAllRefreshTokens** will be removed.</span></span> |

class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-6083">Beta</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-6084">Добавлен ресурс [call](/graph/api/resources/call?view=graph-rest-beta) для управления | <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-6086">Дополнение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-6086">Addition</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-6087">бета</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-6087">Beta</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-6088">Добавлен ресурс [participant](/graph/api/resources/call?view=graph-rest-beta) и API для управления участниками в голосовых и видеозвонках и собраниях, в том числе [получение объекта participant](/graph/api/participant-get?view=graph-rest-beta), [настройка звукового микшера для участника](/graph/api/participant-configuremixer?view=graph-rest-beta), отключение звука [одного](/graph/api/participant-mute?view=graph-rest-beta) или [всех](/graph/api/participant-muteall?view=graph-rest-beta) участников, [получение списка участников](/graph/api/call-list-participants?view=graph-rest-beta) в звонке или собрании и [приглашение участников](/graph/api/participant-invite?view=graph-rest-beta) в звонок или собрание.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-6088">Added the [participant](/graph/api/resources/call?view=graph-rest-beta) resource and APIs for managing the participants in audio/video calls and meetings, including [retrieving a participant object](/graph/api/participant-get?view=graph-rest-beta), [configuring the audio mixer for a participant](/graph/api/participant-configuremixer?view=graph-rest-beta), muting [one](/graph/api/participant-mute?view=graph-rest-beta) or [all](/graph/api/participant-muteall?view=graph-rest-beta) of the participants, [retrieving a list of the participants](/graph/api/call-list-participants?view=graph-rest-beta) in a call/meeting, and [inviting participants](/graph/api/participant-invite?view=graph-rest-beta) to a call/meeting.</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-6089">Дополнение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-6089">Addition</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-6090">бета</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-6090">Beta</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-6091">Добавлены API для приложений по управлению и участию в звонках и собраниях, включая возможность [делиться контентом](/graph/api/call-changescreensharingrole?view=graph-rest-beta), [самостоятельно отключать и включать звук](/graph/api/call-unmute?view=graph-rest-beta) и [обновлять метаданные, связанные со звонком](/graph/api/call-updatemetadata?view=graph-rest-beta).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-6091">Added APIs for applications to manage and participate in calls and meetings, including the ability to [share content](/graph/api/call-changescreensharingrole?view=graph-rest-beta), [mute and unmute itself](/graph/api/call-unmute?view=graph-rest-beta), and [update the metadata associated with a call](/graph/api/call-updatemetadata?view=graph-rest-beta).</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-6092">Дополнение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-6092">Addition</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-6093">бета</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-6093">Beta</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-6094">Добавлен ресурс [audio routing group](/graph/api/resources/audioroutinggroup?view=graph-rest-beta) и API для управления частными звуковыми маршрутами между участниками многосторонней беседы, включая [создание групп маршрутизации звука](/graph/api/call-post-audioroutinggroups?view=graph-rest-beta), [получение их списка](/graph/api/audioroutinggroup-get?view=graph-rest-beta), а также их [обновление](/graph/api/audioroutinggroup-update?view=graph-rest-beta) и [удаление](/graph/api/audioroutinggroup-delete?view=graph-rest-beta).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-6094">Added the [audio routing group](/graph/api/resources/audioroutinggroup?view=graph-rest-beta) resource and APIs for managing private audio routes between participants in a multiparty conversation, including [creating audio routing groups](/graph/api/call-post-audioroutinggroups?view=graph-rest-beta), [retrieving a list of them](/graph/api/audioroutinggroup-get?view=graph-rest-beta), and [updating](/graph/api/audioroutinggroup-update?view=graph-rest-beta) and [deleting](/graph/api/audioroutinggroup-delete?view=graph-rest-beta) them.</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-6095">Дополнение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-6095">Addition</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-6096">бета</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-6096">Beta</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-6097">Добавлен ресурс [online meeting](/graph/api/resources/audioroutinggroup?view=graph-rest-beta) и API для управления собраниями по сети Microsoft Teams.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-6097">Added the [online meeting](/graph/api/resources/audioroutinggroup?view=graph-rest-beta) resource and APIs for managing Microsoft Teams online meetings.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-6098">Изначально существует только один API для собраний по сети для [получения объекта online meeting](/graph/api/onlinemeeting-get?view=graph-rest-beta).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-6098">Initially, there is only one API for online meetings, to [retrieve an online meeting object](/graph/api/onlinemeeting-get?view=graph-rest-beta).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-6099">Также был добавлен соответствующий ресурс для [сведений об аудиоконференции](/graph/api/resources/audioconferencing?view=graph-rest-beta), связанный с собранием (например, URL-адрес телефонного подключения, секретные коды и номера телефонов).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-6099">A related resource for the [audio conference information](/graph/api/resources/audioconferencing?view=graph-rest-beta) associated with a meeting (e.g. dial-in URL, passcodes, and phone numbers) was also added.</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-6100">Дополнение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-6100">Addition</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-6101">бета</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-6101">Beta</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-6102">Выполнение многих из API звонков и собраний занимает длительное время, поэтому были добавлены ресурсы для этих продолжительных операций: [операции, предназначенные для звонков](/graph/api/resources/commsoperation?view=graph-rest-beta), [воспроизведение аудио запросов](/graph/api/resources/playpromptoperation?view=graph-rest-beta) и [ запись](/graph/api/resources/recordoperation?view=graph-rest-beta).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-6102">Many of the calls and meetings APIs take time to complete, so resources for these long-running operations were added: [calling-specific operations](/graph/api/resources/commsoperation?view=graph-rest-beta), [playing audio prompts](/graph/api/resources/playpromptoperation?view=graph-rest-beta), and [recording](/graph/api/resources/recordoperation?view=graph-rest-beta).</span></span>  |

| <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-9836">Дополнение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-9836">Addition</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-9837">Бета</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-9837">Beta</span></span>          | <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-9838">Добавлено свойство **locations** для объекта [event](/graph/api/resources/event?view=graph-rest-beta), позволяющее организовать событие, в котором могут участвовать пользователи из нескольких расположений.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-9838">Added the **locations** property to the [event](/graph/api/resources/event?view=graph-rest-beta) entity to support organizing an event that attendees can attend from more than one location.</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-9839">Дополнение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-9839">Addition</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-9840">Бета</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-9840">Beta</span></span>          | <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-9841">Добавлено свойство **locationType** для сложного типа [location](/graph/api/resources/location?view=graph-rest-beta).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-9841">Added the **locationType** property to the [location](/graph/api/resources/location?view=graph-rest-beta) complex type.</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-9842">Дополнение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-9842">Addition</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-9843">Бета</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-9843">Beta</span></span>          | <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-9844">Добавлены свойства **uniqueId** и **uniqueIdType** для сложного типа [location](/graph/api/resources/location?view=graph-rest-beta).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-9844">Added the **uniqueId** and **uniqueIdType** properties to the [location](/graph/api/resources/location?view=graph-rest-beta) complex type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-9845">В настоящее время эти свойства предназначены только для внутреннего использования.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-9845">These properties are only for internal use at this point.</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-9846">Изменение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-9846">Change</span></span>          | <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-9847">1.0 и бета-версия</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-9847">v1.0 and beta</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-9848">Это улучшение поведения связано с получением общего календаря или содержимого событий в нем, если кто-то предоставил вошедшему пользователю доступ к календарю или делегировал ему почтовый ящик пользователя.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-9848">This behavior enhancement is about getting a shared calendar or its event contents, when a user has shared a calendar with the signed-in user, or has delegated the user's mailbox to the signed-in user.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-9849">В таких случаях приложение может указать ИД пользователя или имя участника-пользователя, чтобы [получить этот общий календарь](/graph/api/calendar-get?view=graph-rest-1.0) или [получить события из этого общего календаря](/graph/api/user-list-events?view=graph-rest-1.0), при условии что вошедший пользователь предоставил приложению делегированные разрешения.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-9849">In such situations, an app can specify that user's ID or user principal name to [get that shared calendar](/graph/api/calendar-get?view=graph-rest-1.0), or [get the events in that shared calendar](/graph/api/user-list-events?view=graph-rest-1.0), as long as the signed-in user has provided delegated permissions to the app.</span></span> |

| <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-10085">Изменение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-10085">Change</span></span>          | <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-10086">1.0 и бета-версия</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-10086">v1.0 and beta</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-10087">Это улучшение поведения связано с получением общей папки контактов или содержимого контактов в ней, если кто-то предоставил вошедшему пользователю доступ к папке контактов или делегировал ему почтовый ящик пользователя.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-10087">This behavior enhancement is about getting a shared contact folder or its contact contents, when a user has shared a contact folder with the signed-in user, or has delegated the user's mailbox to the signed-in user.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-10088">В таких случаях приложение может указать ИД пользователя или имя участника-пользователя, чтобы [получить эту общую папку контактов](/graph/api/contactfolder-get?view=graph-rest-1.0) или [получить контакты из этой общей папки](/graph/api/user-list-contacts?view=graph-rest-1.0), при условии что вошедший пользователь предоставил приложению делегированные разрешения.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-10088">In such situations, an app can specify that user's ID or user principal name to [get that shared contact folder](/graph/api/contactfolder-get?view=graph-rest-1.0), or [get the contacts in that shared folder](/graph/api/user-list-contacts?view=graph-rest-1.0), as long as the signed-in user has provided delegated permissions to the app.</span></span> |

### <a name="extensions--schema-extensions"></a><span data-ttu-id="a50bf-10782">Расширения | Расширения схемы</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-10782">Extensions | Schema extensions</span></span>

| <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-10783">**Тип изменения**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-10783">**Change type**</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-10784">**Версия**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-10784">**Version**</span></span>   | <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-10785">**Описание**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-10785">**Description**</span></span>                          |
| :-------------- | :------------ | :--------------------------------------- |
| <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-10786">Дополнение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-10786">Addition</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-10787">1.0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-10787">v1.0</span></span>          | <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-p218">Новый ресурс [schemaExtension](/graph/api/resources/schemaextension?view=graph-rest-1.0) и методы CRUD для управления определениями расширений для следующих ресурсов: [contact](/graph/api/resources/contact?view=graph-rest-1.0), [device](/graph/api/resources/device?view=graph-rest-1.0), [event](/graph/api/resources/event?view=graph-rest-1.0), [group](/graph/api/resources/group?view=graph-rest-1.0), [message](/graph/api/resources/message?view=graph-rest-1.0), [organization](/graph/api/resources/organization?view=graph-rest-1.0), [post](/graph/api/resources/post?view=graph-rest-1.0) и [user](/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-1.0). Обратите внимание, что объект [administrativeUnit](/graph/api/resources/administrativeunit?view=graph-rest-beta) по-прежнему поддерживается только в бета-версии.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-p218">New resource [schemaExtension](/graph/api/resources/schemaextension?view=graph-rest-1.0) and CRUD methods to manage extension definitions for the following resources: [contact](/graph/api/resources/contact?view=graph-rest-1.0), [device](/graph/api/resources/device?view=graph-rest-1.0), [event](/graph/api/resources/event?view=graph-rest-1.0), [group](/graph/api/resources/group?view=graph-rest-1.0), [message](/graph/api/resources/message?view=graph-rest-1.0), [organization](/graph/api/resources/organization?view=graph-rest-1.0), [post](/graph/api/resources/post?view=graph-rest-1.0), [user](/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-1.0). Note that support for [administrativeUnit](/graph/api/resources/administrativeunit?view=graph-rest-beta) is still limited to the beta version as before.</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-10790">Дополнение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-10790">Addition</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-10791">1.0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-10791">v1.0</span></span>          | <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-10792">Существующие методы POST, GET и PATCH ресурсов [contact](/graph/api/resources/contact?view=graph-rest-1.0), [device](/graph/api/resources/device?view=graph-rest-1.0), [event](/graph/api/resources/event?view=graph-rest-1.0), [group](/graph/api/resources/group?view=graph-rest-1.0), [message](/graph/api/resources/message?view=graph-rest-1.0), [organization](/graph/api/resources/organization?view=graph-rest-1.0), [post](/graph/api/resources/post?view=graph-rest-1.0) и [user](/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-1.0) теперь поддерживают добавление, получение, обновление и удаление пользовательских данных, хранящихся в виде расширений схемы в соответствующих экземплярах ресурсов.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-10792">The existing POST, GET, and PATCH methods of the following resources - [contact](/graph/api/resources/contact?view=graph-rest-1.0), [device](/graph/api/resources/device?view=graph-rest-1.0), [event](/graph/api/resources/event?view=graph-rest-1.0), [group](/graph/api/resources/group?view=graph-rest-1.0), [message](/graph/api/resources/message?view=graph-rest-1.0), [organization](/graph/api/resources/organization?view=graph-rest-1.0), [post](/graph/api/resources/post?view=graph-rest-1.0), [user](/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-1.0) - now support adding, getting, and updating or deleting custom data stored as schema extensions in the corresponding resource instances.</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-10793">Дополнение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-10793">Addition</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-10794">1.0 и бета-версия</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-10794">v1.0 and beta</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-p219">Теперь вы можете использовать параметр `$filter` для поиска экземпляров ресурсов, свойства которых совпадают с определенным значениями свойств расширений, например имени. Эта возможность рассматривается подробнее в этом [примере](extensibility-schema-groups.md#5-get-a-group-and-its-extension-data).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-p219">You can now use `$filter` to look for resource instances with properties that match specific extension property values, such as extension name. See this [example](extensibility-schema-groups.md#5-get-a-group-and-its-extension-data) for details.</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-10797">Изменение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-10797">Change</span></span>          | <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-10798">1.0 и бета</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-10798">v1.0 and beta</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-10799">[Удаление определения расширения схемы](/graph/api/schemaextension-delete?view=graph-rest-1.0) больше не влияет на доступ к пользовательским данным, добавленным на основе этого определения.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-10799">[Deleting a schema extension definition](/graph/api/schemaextension-delete?view=graph-rest-1.0) no longer affects accessing custom data that has been added based on that definition.</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-10800">Изменение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-10800">Change</span></span>          | <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-10801">1.0 и бета</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-10801">v1.0 and beta</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-10802">Теперь вы можете задать для сложного типа расширения схемы значение null, чтобы удалить расширение схемы из экземпляра ресурса.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-10802">You can now set a schema extension complex type to null, to remove a schema extension from a resource instance.</span></span> |

[Управление привилегированными пользователями](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/active-directory/privileged-identity-management/pim-configure) обеспечивает активацию "точно в срок" для привилегированных ролей в организации Azure AD, например ролей глобального администратора, администратора выставления счетов и т. д. C помощью опубликованных API разработчики могут создавать приложения, которые получают и обновляют привилегированные роли и активируют роли для пользователей. Дополнительные сведения см. в статьях [Microsoft Graph: доступна бета-версия API для Azure AD Privileged Identity Management](https://developer.microsoft.com/office/blogs/microsoft-graph-azure-ad-privileged-identity-management-apis-beta/) и [Azure AD Privileged Identity Management](/graph/api/resources/privilegedidentitymanagement-root?view=graph-rest-beta).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-p250">Privileged Identity Management (PIM) REST APIs now are available in the Microsoft Graph beta endpoint. [Privileged Identity Management](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/active-directory/privileged-identity-management/pim-configure) provides just in time activation for privileged Azure AD organizational roles such as Global Administrator, Billing Administrator, and so on. You can use the published APIs to write applications that retrieve and update privileged role assignments, and activate users into roles. For details, see [Microsoft Graph: Azure AD Privileged Identity Management Preview APIs available in Beta](https://developer.microsoft.com/office/blogs/microsoft-graph-azure-ad-privileged-identity-management-apis-beta/) and [Azure AD Privileged Identity Management](/graph/api/resources/privilegedidentitymanagement-root?view=graph-rest-beta).</span></span> |

| <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-12536">Дополнение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-12536">Addition</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-12537">1.0 и бета-версия</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-12537">v1.0 and beta</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-12538">Атрибуты экземпляра _conflictBehavior_ теперь можно применять к _driveItem_.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-12538">_conflictBehavior_ instance attributes is now applicable to _driveItem_.</span></span> |

| <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-12561">**Тип изменения**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-12561">**Change type**</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-12562">**Версия**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-12562">**Version**</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="a50bf-12563">**Описание**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-12563">**Description**</span></span>                          |

Теперь вы можете создавать интеллектуальные приложения, с помощью которых пользователи смогут эффективно анализировать содержимое, хранящееся в рабочих книгах Excel. Используйте аналитические функции Excel, создавайте таблицы и визуально привлекательные диаграммы в своем приложении. Дополнительные сведения см. в статье [Работа с Excel в Microsoft Graph](/graph/api/resources/excel?view=graph-rest-beta).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-p264">We are adding new Excel REST APIs that let you read and modify data in an Excel workbook. It is now possible to build smart apps that allows users to get value out of the content stored in an Excel workbook by providing insights into the data. Take advantage of analytical powers of Excel, create tables and charts and extract visually appealing chart image - all from within your app. For details, see [Working with Excel in Microsoft Graph](/graph/api/resources/excel?view=graph-rest-beta).</span></span> |

POST https://graph.microsoft.com/v1.0/me/getMemberGroups</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a50bf-p267">The prefix is now no longer required (although it can still be specified).
